MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G4  postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in West Princes Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:38pm. Our engineers have arrived at South Woodside Road South substation and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:45pm. When we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:31pm on Saturday, 27 March 2021
